CustomField.formula: IF(ProductAttributeValueId__r.Apttus_Config2__LineItemId__r.Apttus_Config2__ProductId__r.ProductCode == "MPW",'Please select if you need IXR-e 14x10GE or IXR-E 24x1/10GE + 8x25GE+ 2x100GE.',IF(ProductAttributeValueId__r.Apttus_Config2__LineItemId__r.Apttus_Config2__ProductId__r.ProductCode == "7705SAR18",'Select an additional Compact Flash Module if required.','Please select the OS and RTU licenses you require. Please contact Nokia if you are unsure which Licenses will meet your needs.'))
CustomField.label: Guidance
